products.title: Mens Formal Shirt
products.description: Dark blue formal shirt for men, perfect for office wear and formal occasions. Made from premium cotton for all-day comfort.

products.title: Checked Shirt
products.description: Stylish checked shirt by Louis Philippe. Ideal for business casual and smart casual looks. Soft fabric for maximum comfort.

products.title: Cotton Kurti
products.description: Stay comfortable and stylish all day with this breathable cotton kurti. Designed for everyday elegance, it features a relaxed fit and minimalistic print, perfect for work or casual outings.

products.title: Printed Kurti
products.description: Add charm to your wardrobe with this smart printed kurti. Made from soft, lightweight fabric, it blends modern design with comfort—ideal for both office wear and weekend plans.

products.title: Lehenga Choli
products.description: This vibrant red lehenga choli features detailed embroidery and a flared silhouette, perfect for weddings and cultural celebrations.

products.title: Gown for Girls
products.description: Elegant green gown crafted from soft fabric with subtle shimmer, ideal for festive events and parties.

products.title: Sports Shoes
products.description: Breathable and lightweight sports shoes in black, ideal for running and gym workouts.

products.title: Lace-Up Sneakers
products.description: Trendy white sneakers with cushioned insole and durable sole for all-day comfort and style.

products.title: Patterned Slip-ons
products.description: Trendy handcrafted slip-ons with ethnic patterns, perfect for casual outings and everyday comfort.

products.title: Strap Sandals
products.description: Elegant brown sandals featuring adjustable straps and cushioned footbed for extended comfort.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy A15
products.description: Samsung Galaxy A15 with stunning light blue finish, 5G connectivity, vibrant display, and powerful performance.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy M14
products.description: Galaxy M14 5G offers efficient multitasking, powerful battery life, and sharp camera in a stylish navy blue.

products.title: Gold-Plated Chain
products.description: Elegant gold-plated chain with maroon beads, perfect for traditional outfits and festive occasions.

products.title: Traditional Necklace
products.description: A minimal yet classic gold-plated necklace, ideal for daily wear and casual traditional styling.

products.title: Oxidized Necklace
products.description: Antique-style oxidized necklace featuring tribal elements, best suited for Indo-western and boho looks.

products.title: Lenovo IdeaPad
products.description: 15.6-inch FHD laptop with Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD – ideal for everyday computing.

products.title: HP Pavilion
products.description: Touchscreen 2-in-1 laptop with sleek design and powerful performance, perfect for productivity on the go.

products.title: Basic Laptop
products.description: Simple and budget-friendly laptop designed for basic browsing and educational needs.
